definition: contrary/in reverse/inside out or upside down/to reverse/to return/to oppose/opposite/against/anti-/to rebel/to use analogy/instead/abbr. for 反切[fan3 qie4] phonetic system
thoroughfare/to go straight ahead/to rush/to clash

sentences.english: Backwashing is one of the methods to maintain a filter bed clean.
sentences.chinese: 反衝洗是保持濾牀清潔的方法之一。

sentences.english: The running of ais water antiflushing filter and common points for attention in it are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了氣水反衝洗濾池的運行操作和一般注意事項。

sentences.english: After he pulled the trigger, the rifle kicked back and the hunter lost his balance.
sentences.chinese: 獵人扣動板機，獵槍的反衝力使他的身體失去了平衡。

sentences.english: The rifle recoils when it is fired.
sentences.chinese: 步槍射出子彈後要反衝一下。

sentences.english: Can automatically remove and small particles, unlike backwash strainers.
sentences.chinese: 不同於反衝洗過濾器，它可以自動清除大小顆粒。

sentences.english: The backwashing frequency of bio-ceramic filter is one time per week.
sentences.chinese: 生物陶粒柱的反衝頻率爲每週一次。

sentences.english: Some of the energy intended for the photon is drained off by the recoiling atom.
sentences.chinese: 原來給予光子的能量有一部分爲反衝原子所消耗。

sentences.english: When an atom shoots out a photon of light, it recoils like a gun.
sentences.chinese: 原子發出光子時，會象槍一樣地反衝。

sentences.english: Can automatically remove large and small particles, unlike backwash strainers .
sentences.chinese: 不同於反衝洗過濾器，它可以自動清除大小顆粒。

sentences.english: Some of the dim branches exhibit bright recoil leaders.
sentences.chinese: 一部分暗淡的分叉顯示出閃亮的反衝先導。

sentences.english: Impact of backwashing on biomass growth in biological active filter was researched.
sentences.chinese: 研究了反衝洗對生物活性濾池生物量的影響。

sentences.english: Backwash cycle has more effect on ammonia nitrogen removal rate.
sentences.chinese: 反衝洗週期對氨氮的去除率有較大影響。

sentences.english: Stainless steel has a greater elastic springback than mild steel.
sentences.chinese: 不鏽鋼的彈性反衝比低碳鋼要強。

sentences.english: Now, there has been a backlash against the backlash.
sentences.chinese: 現在，曾經有一個反衝的反彈。

sentences.english: Reverse flow, backwash, gauges, drain connections and sight glasses can all be economically incorporated.
sentences.chinese: 該設備裝有逆流，反衝洗裝置，排水管接口和觀察鏡。

sentences.english: Luckily it missed me, but there must have been some kind of Backlash.
sentences.chinese: 還好雪崩沒有砸到我可是它一定產生了某種反衝。
